messages.body: $AAPL Apple is reportedly aiming to release an 8K virtual reality headset in two years. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-report-apple-inc-aapl-working-on-a-vr-headset-to/

links.title: Report: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Working On A VR Headset To Be Released In 2020
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has thus far steered clear of the virtual reality space, with CEO Tim Cook noting repeatedly that current hardware capabilities aren't strong enough to support a great experience. Well, the tech titan may have finally cracked that code.

messages.body: 7 Important Things to Watch as Apple Reports Earnings on Tuesday $AAPL http://dlvr.it/QR4Q4r

links.title: 7 Important Things to Watch as Apple Reports Earnings on Tuesday
links.description: Apple's ( AAPL) shares certainly haven't been unscathed as one chip supplier after another has offered bleak commentary about near-term smartphone demand. And even before this selloff, shares were trading at pretty subdued multiples. For that reason, expectations are far from high as Tim Cook's company gets set to release its March quarter (fiscal second quarter) report at 4:30 p.m.

messages.body: $AAPL This will be huge. https://www.macrumors.com/2018/04/27/apple-ar-vr-headset-8k-displays/

links.title: Apple Working on AR/VR Headset With 8K Displays and No Smartphone or Computer Tether
links.description: Apple is working on a powerful headset that will support both augmented reality and virtual reality applications, according to an inside source that spoke to . The headset, which is codenamed T288, features an 8K display for each eye that would be untethered from either a computer or a smartphone.

messages.body: $AAPL @Keepinitreal11 Pack of silly rumours from the king of rumours that are mostly invented by KGI - Ming Chi-Kuo.

message.body: Budget iPhone X, iPhone SE 2 Leaks Reveal Surprising Features $AAPL https://www.forbes.com/sites/gordonkelly/2018/04/26/apple-iphone-se-2-iphone-x-2-new-iphone-specs-release-date-upgrade/

links.title: Budget iPhone X, iPhone SE 2 Leaks Reveal Surprising Features
links.description: Looking to upgrade your iPhone in 2018? plans are becoming clearer. A major revamp of its iPhones is coming, but now new leaks have revealed what Apple will change and what it will not... Let's break them down: Leak #1 - The Affordable, Durable iPhone X The biggest news comes from arguably the biggest Apple insider of them all.
